00034 namespace cupp {

00036 using namespace cupp::kernel_impl;
00037 
00048 class kernel {
00049         public:
00058                 template< typename CudaKernelFunc>
00059                 kernel( CudaKernelFunc f, const dim3 &grid_dim, const dim3 &block_dim, const size_t shared_mem=0, const int tokens = 0) :
00060                 number_of_parameters_(boost::function_traits < typename boost::remove_pointer<CudaKernelFunc>::type >::arity),
00061                 dirty ( kernel_launcher_impl< CudaKernelFunc >::dirty_parameters() ) {
00062                 
00063                         kb_ = new kernel_launcher_impl< CudaKernelFunc >(f, grid_dim, block_dim, shared_mem, tokens);
00064                 }
00065 
00069                 ~kernel() {  delete kb_;  }
00070 
00071 
00076                 void operator()(const device &d);
00077 
00078 
00084                 template< typename P1 >
00085                 void operator()(const device &d, const P1 &p1 );
00086                 
00093                 template< typename P1, typename P2 >
00094                 void operator()(const device &d, const P1 &p1, const P2 &p2 );
00095 
00103                 template< typename P1, typename P2, typename P3 >
00104                 void operator()(const device &d, const P1 &p1, const P2 &p2, const P3 &p3 );
00105 
00106                 
00107         private:
00113                 template <typename P>
00114                 inline void handle_call_traits(const P &p, const int i, const device &d );
00115 
00120                 inline void check_number_of_parameters (const int number);
00121 
00122         private:
00126                 const int number_of_parameters_;
00127 
00131                 kernel_launcher_base* kb_;
00132 
00136                 const std::vector<bool> dirty;
00137 
00141                 std::vector<boost::any> returnee_vec;
00142 };
00143 
00144 
00145 void kernel::check_number_of_parameters (const int number) {
00146         if (number_of_parameters_ != number) {
00147                 throw exception::kernel_number_of_parameters_mismatch(number_of_parameters_, number);
00148         }
00149 }
00150 
00151 
00152 template <typename P>
00153 void kernel::handle_call_traits(const P &p, const int i, const device &d) {
00154         if (dirty[i-1]) {
00155                 typedef typename kernel_device_type<P>::type device_type;
00156                 typedef typename kernel_host_type<P>::type host_type;
00157                 shared_device_pointer<device_type> device_ptr = boost::any_cast< shared_device_pointer<device_type> >(returnee_vec[i-1]);
00158 
00159                 kernel_call_traits<host_type, device_type>::dirty(d, p, device_ptr);
00160         }
00161 }
00162 
00163 
00164 /***  OPERATPR()  ***/
00165 void kernel::operator()(const device &d) {
00166         check_number_of_parameters(0);
00167         
00168         kb_ -> configure_call();
00169 
00170         kb_->launch();
00171 }
00172 
00173 template< typename P1 >
00174 void kernel::operator()(const device &d, const P1 &p1 ) {
00175         check_number_of_parameters(1);
00176         
00177         kb_ -> configure_call();
00178 
00179         returnee_vec.push_back ( kb_-> setup_argument(d, boost::any(&p1), 1 ) );
00180 
00181         kb_->launch();
00182 
00183         handle_call_traits (p1, 1, d);
00184 
00185         returnee_vec.clear();
00186 }
00187 
00188 template< typename P1, typename P2 >
00189 void kernel::operator()(const device &d, const P1 &p1, const P2 &p2 ) {
00190         check_number_of_parameters(2);
00191         
00192         kb_ -> configure_call();
00193 
00194         returnee_vec.push_back ( kb_-> setup_argument(d, boost::any(&p1), 1 ) );
00195         returnee_vec.push_back ( kb_-> setup_argument(d, boost::any(&p2), 2 ) );
00196 
00197         kb_->launch();
00198 
00199         handle_call_traits (p1, 1, d);
00200         handle_call_traits (p2, 2, d);
00201 
00202         returnee_vec.clear();
00203 }
00204 
00205 template< typename P1, typename P2, typename P3 >
00206 void kernel::operator()(const device &d, const P1 &p1, const P2 &p2, const P3 &p3 ) {
00207         check_number_of_parameters(3);
00208         
00209         kb_ -> configure_call();
00210 
00211         returnee_vec.push_back ( kb_-> setup_argument(d, boost::any(&p1), 1 ) );
00212         returnee_vec.push_back ( kb_-> setup_argument(d, boost::any(&p2), 2 ) );
00213         returnee_vec.push_back ( kb_-> setup_argument(d, boost::any(&p3), 3 ) );
00214 
00215         kb_->launch();
00216 
00217         handle_call_traits (p1, 1, d);
00218         handle_call_traits (p2, 2, d);
00219         handle_call_traits (p2, 3, d);
00220 
00221         returnee_vec.clear();
00222 }
